questions.question: Taking place in a mysterious forest, involving the rescue of Sanji and a confrontation with Big Mom. What is...?
This arc takes place on an archipelago near the Red Line and features the separation of the Straw Hat crew. What is...?
Taking place on a unique island, this arc introduces the character of Chopper, a reindeer with the ability to transform. What is...?
This is the technique used by Monkey D. Luffy that allows him to drastically increase his muscle mass and size. What is...?
This power, used by a high-ranking member of the Revolutionary Army, allows control over the properties of gravity. What is...?
This technique, used by Brook, involves using the cold of the underworld to freeze opponents. What is...?
This character, known for their Straw Hat, is the captain of the Straw Hat Pirates and dreams of becoming the Pirate King. Who is...?
This character, a member of the Straw Hat Pirates and a skilled archaeologist, is known for her ability to read Poneglyphs. Who is...?
This member of the Straw Hat Pirates is a skilled cook and martial artist, known for his kicks and dream of finding the All Blue. Who is...?
